summary: Implements a handler that orchestrates communication with the Gemini generative model, building and updating message histories, preprocessing user queries, integrating tool definitions, executing generated code snippets, and translating the model's output into structured results for downstream use.
business_intent: Enable seamless function‑calling and tool‑use capabilities with Gemini within the Berkeley Function Call Leaderboard ecosystem, allowing automated code execution and result extraction to support AI‑driven application workflows.
